name: Pure Hands
mission: Pure Hands, Inc.s mission is preservation of human lives by elimination of hunger through detection, prevention and treatment of malnutrition. Pure Hands, Inc. tackles the underlying causes of malnutrition and poverty during and after emergency situations
theoryOfChange: Pure Hands states its goal is to make an impactful difference by focusing its dedicated team and resources into building a long-term solution for Yemen, and that it improves lives by providing access to basic necessities for survival: food, water, and medicine.
zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://purehands.org/zakat (Source: https://purehands.org/zakat)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Context dependent profile. Consider cause fit, risk profile, and evidence maturity before deciding.

components.improvement_suggestion: Increase operating reserves to reduce continuity risk; set a board-approved minimum (typically at least 3 months).

components.improvement_suggestion: Seek external evaluation or track outcomes over at least 3 years.

score_details.score_summary: Pure Hands Inc. shows exceptional alignment and good impact, with zakat compliance (minor risk deductions applied).

all_citations.claim: Pure Hands maintains a Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100 and a program expense ratio of 98.2%.
The organization reported total revenue of $184,894,296 and fundraising efficiency of $0.02 per $1 raised.
The mission involves delivering quality relief, livelihood, and capacity-building services to vulnerable communities in Yemen.
The charity provides various donation options and methods for supporting their humanitarian programs.
Pure Hands is zakat-eligible and maintains specific policies regarding zakat asnaf categories.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Pure Hands earns a solid overall score due to its high alignment with humanitarian needs and exceptional financial efficiency, though its overall score is tempered by a moderate impact rating and low working capital.
areas_for_improvement: Limited liquidity with working capital covering only 0.4 months of operations
Opportunity to improve impact measurement transparency to raise the impact score

dimension_explanations.alignment: With an alignment score of 46/50, the charity shows high donor fit for those prioritizing urgent humanitarian causes [1]. It is officially zakat-eligible, offering specific giving options for Muslim donors to fulfill their religious obligations in accordance with established policies [4][5].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization focuses on direct provision of aid through programs like the Blessed Bakery, health services, and food security initiatives [3]. While it maintains a strong Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100, the impact score of 28/50 reflects a balanced performance between high-volume aid delivery and the need for more robust evidence of long-term outcomes [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and sustainable development to vulnerable communities in Yemen through high-efficiency programming.
strengths: Exceptional program expense ratio of 98.2%, ensuring the vast majority of funds reach those in need
High fundraising efficiency with a cost of only $0.02 per $1 raised
Verified zakat-eligible status with clear policies on asnaf categories
baseline_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a non-profit organization dedicated to delivering quality relief, livelihood, and capacity-building services to communities in Yemen and beyond [3]. The organization operates with a high level of financial efficiency, reporting a total revenue of $184,894,296 while maintaining a program expense ratio of 98.2% [1][2].

all_citations.claim: food security, health, water and sanitation (WASH)
all_citations.quote: Programs: Food Security, Health, WASH, Shelter

rich_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Pure Hands earns a solid overall score due to its high alignment with humanitarian needs and exceptional financial efficiency, though its overall score is tempered by a moderate impact rating and low working capital.

areas_for_improvement.context: The organization has very limited reserves, with <cite id="1">working capital covering only 0.6 months</cite> of operating expenses, posing a risk to long-term continuity.
While the charity tracks <cite id="1">two distinct outcome metrics</cite> via Candid, there is an opportunity to move toward more rigorous external evaluations.

bbb_assessment.summary: Pure Hands is a BBB Accredited Charity meeting all standards for accountability.

case_against.mitigation_notes: The high revenue growth of <cite id="2">24.3% CAGR</cite> suggests strong donor trust which partially offsets liquidity risks.
risk_factors: High geographic concentration risk in Yemen
case_against.summary: The primary concern is financial sustainability; the charity operates on <cite id="1">extremely thin margins</cite> with less than one month of cash reserves.

confidence.notes: Financial data is exceptionally current and consistent across sources.

known_gaps: Detailed board member names not in summary data

alignment.explanation: Alignment is excellent for Muslim donors due to <cite id="5">explicit zakat policies</cite> and a focus on <cite id="3">underserved populations in Yemen</cite>.

credibility.explanation: Pure Hands is highly credible, evidenced by its <cite id="1">4-star Charity Navigator rating</cite> and <cite id="1">100% independent board of directors</cite>.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility, the organization should <cite id="1">increase its operating reserves</cite> to at least 3 months to ensure organizational stability.

impact.explanation: The charity achieves a high impact through <cite id="1">direct provision of services</cite> at a cost-effective rate of approximately <cite id="1">$10.36 per beneficiary</cite>.
impact.improvement: Impact scores could be raised by <cite id="1">tracking outcomes over a longer period (3+ years)</cite> and seeking third-party impact validations.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade C - Outcome tracking via Candid

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Funds local Yemeni partners and domestic community centers

rich_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and sustainable development to vulnerable communities in Yemen through high-efficiency programming.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to provide immediate, high-efficiency humanitarian aid to Yemen and prioritize seeing nearly 100% of their donation reach the field.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations for the needy in Yemen
Value extreme financial efficiency and low overhead
Prefer organizations with a singular, deep geographic focus
giving_considerations: The charity has low cash reserves, meaning it relies heavily on continuous incoming donations
Impact is focused on relief and development rather than systemic advocacy
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking an organization with a large global footprint or those who prioritize high financial reserves over immediate spending.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The charity tracks <cite id="1">two outcome metrics</cite> and has a clear theory of change, but lacks independent RCT-level evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Pure Hands uses a direct provision model to deliver food, health, and WASH services to reduce mortality and improve livelihoods in Yemen.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence ensures that the high volume of aid delivered actually results in long-term health and stability for Yemeni families.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The ongoing crisis in Yemen creates a massive funding gap that Pure Hands is well-positioned to fill given its <cite id="2">24.3% growth rate</cite>.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Pure Hands stands out for its <cite id="1">100.0% program ratio</cite>, which is significantly higher than many larger international NGOs.
similar_orgs: Helping Hand for Relief and Development

similar_organizations.differentiator: Larger scale and more diverse programs
similar_organizations.name: Helping Hand for Relief

similar_organizations.differentiator: Focuses on multiple international crisis zones
similar_organizations.name: Baitulmaal

strengths.detail: The organization maintains a <cite id="1">98.2% program expense ratio</cite>, ensuring maximum resource allocation to direct aid in Yemen.
Pure Hands demonstrates remarkable cost-effectiveness, spending only <cite id="1">$0.02 to raise every $1</cite> in contributions.
The charity holds a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid and a <cite id="1">perfect 100/100 score in the Culture & Community beacon</cite> from Charity Navigator.

strengths_deep_dive: Pure Hands' operational model is built on extreme lean management, as evidenced by its <cite id="2">$184.3 million in public contributions</cite> being funneled almost entirely into program services. This efficiency is further validated by its <cite id="1">100% independent board</cite>, which provides robust oversight of its <cite id="2">$184.9 million annual budget</cite>. The organization's ability to maintain such high ratios while managing complex logistics in a conflict zone like Yemen is a significant differentiator in the humanitarian sector.
rich_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a specialized humanitarian organization dedicated to providing life-saving relief and sustainable development to vulnerable populations in Yemen. Founded in <cite id="3">2012</cite>, the organization has rapidly scaled its operations to address one of the world's most severe humanitarian crises, reporting a <cite id="2">total revenue of $184,894,296 in 2023</cite>. The charity is distinguished by its exceptional financial efficiency, maintaining a <cite id="1">program expense ratio of 98.2%</cite> according to its most recent filings. This ensures that nearly every dollar donated is directed toward its core mission areas, including <cite id="3">food security, health, water and sanitation (WASH), and orphan support</cite>. Pure Hands operates through a direct provision model, which allows for <cite id="1">high accountability and lower overhead costs</cite>, evidenced by a fundraising efficiency of <cite id="1">$0.02 per $1 raised</cite>. The organization holds a <cite id="1">4-star rating from Charity Navigator</cite> with an <cite id="1">overall score of 89.75/100</cite>, reflecting strong performance across financial health and transparency metrics. For Muslim donors, the charity offers a <cite id="5">verified zakat-eligible platform</cite> that specifically targets the <cite id="5">fuqara (poor) and masakin (needy)</cite> within Yemen, ensuring compliance with Islamic philanthropic principles.
